document.full_text: britain's first official royal app was launched on tuesday, and with the marriage of prince william to kate middleton just weeks away, unsurprisingly it focuses on royal weddings.
document.title: first official uk "royal app" launched for wedding
lines_and_colors: britain's first official royal app was launched on tuesday, and with the marriage of prince william to kate middleton just weeks away, unsurprisingly it focuses on royal weddings.
